overview: OWNED BY BENJAMIN ORTIZ AND NO ONE ELSE  After buying many fries and not giving any to anybody, 16 year old boy Alexander Reynoso has just discovered himself as the god of Spaniards. before facing with the challenges of love and hatred, Alex must realize who he is inside. A Mexican? or a Spaniard?
tagline: YOU DON'T GET TO COLONIZE MILLIONS WITHOUT HAVING A FEW REVOLUTIONS
title: The Alex Network
